scripts.dev: cross-env-file -p .env.dev.json concurrently --kill-others -n=svelte,electron -c='#ff3e00',blue "vite dev" "bun electron.esbuild.config.ts && electron resources/app/electron.mjs"
scripts.build:electron: bun run clear-dist && cross-env-file -p .env.prod.json electron-builder -w --config build.config.json
scripts.build:electron:beta: bun run clear-dist && cross-env-file -p .env.prod.beta.json electron-builder -w --config build.beta.config.json
scripts.build:electron:release: bun run clear-dist && cross-env-file -p .env.prod.json electron-builder -p always -w --config build.config.json
scripts.build:electron:release:beta: bun run clear-dist && cross-env-file -p .env.prod.beta.json electron-builder -p always -w --config build.beta.config.json
scripts.build: bun run pack:electron && bun run pack:vite && bun run build:electron
scripts.build:beta: bun run pack:electron:beta && bun run pack:vite:beta && bun run build:electron:beta
scripts.release: bun run release-it:release && bun run pack:electron && bun run pack:vite && bun run build:electron:release
scripts.release:beta: bun run release-it:release:beta && bun run pack:electron:beta && bun run pack:vite:beta && bun run build:electron:release:beta
